OrderTemplates.orderTemplateText: Create a list of frequently purchased items for convenience and fast re-ordering. You can build order templates for Complete systems, Track Stock, Warehouse Inventory,Tools and Suppliers, or really anything that you want to have very quick access to purchase. To create an order template simply click on the Create Order Template button, enter the name for the template, and then just add the items you want to include.
